snippet: Officials said that it was the most serious fake marine distress call in years and that it put rescue personnel and the general public at risk.
abstract: Officials said that it was the most serious fake marine distress call in years and that it put rescue personnel and the general public at risk.

headline.main: Coast Guard Offers Details and Reward After Hoax
headline.print_headline: Coast Guard Offers Details And Reward After a Hoax
